title: CSF
subtitle: Cerebrospinal Fluid Proteomics Analysis
description: Discover and quantify neurological biomarkers in cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) samples. Provide specialized analysis for neurodegenerative diseases and central nervous system disorders including Alzheimer's, Parkinson's, and multiple sclerosis.

features.title: Neurological Biomarkers
features.description: Detect brain-specific proteins, neuroinflammation markers, and neurodegeneration indicators in CSF. Maximize the value of rare and precious CSF samples.

features.title: Low Sample Volume
features.description: Deep proteomics analysis possible from limited CSF samples of 10-50Î¼L. Extract maximum information with highly sensitive workflows.

features.title: Disease Diagnosis Support
features.description: Early diagnosis of neurodegenerative diseases, disease stage classification, and treatment response monitoring. Improve diagnostic accuracy by integrating with existing clinical markers.
